meanings.definition: A feudal due or tribute paid to a lord upon the death of a tenant.
meanings.sent1: The heriot was a payment made to the lord when the tenant passed away.
meanings.sent2: The lord received a heriot when the tenant died as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: The heriot was like a farewell gift to the lord from the tenant's family.
meanings.sent4: The heriot symbolized the end of the tenant's time on the land.
meanings.sent5: The tradition of the heriot dated back many generations.
